data.author: Justin Hamilton

changelog.release_notes: Added bluetooth monitor, changed startup animations, changed battery monitor a bit.

Faster Startup Animation
New Menu Image!

Changed the battery monitor
Changed the startup actions

Changes to the battery monitor:
On plugin and unplug, the battery percentage appears for 3 seconds.
When the battery is fully charged, the charging notification now shows "CHARGED" instead of "CHARGING".

Tweaked a few animations as well.

Added a new charging notification, which appears at the top, instead of replacing the battery percentage.
Minor bugfixes.
This release adds new startup animations.
I removed the bluetooth connection monitor until I can make it more stable. It was too buggy to be included in the public release.
This update includes a date display, and a bluetooth disconnect notification (Still a bit buggy on reconnection, but it's reliable).

data.description:
This is a watchface that fills a quarter of the screen with the opposite color every 15 seconds.
On a shake, the battery and date are displayed, and a charging notification is shown on plugin.

The animation code is a modification of Bonsitm's Split Horizon watchface.
The battery code is a modification of Pebble's Classio Battery Connection watchface.

latest_release.release_notes: Added bluetooth monitor, changed startup animations, changed battery monitor a bit.

data.title: Fill
